original_title: Two shot dead in separate shooting incidents
original_body_lines: Two individuals were killed in two separate shooting incidents in Homagama and Kosgoda, Police said.
One shooting incident was in the Iddaruwa area in Kosgoda this morning (21) where a 42-year-old person was shot dead by two unidentified gunmen on a motorcycle.
The incident happened in front of the victim’s house around 6.00 a.m.
The victim has been identified as Vijith alias “Ran Mahaththaya”.
Meanwhile, another individual aged 46 years was shot dead at his home in Homagama last night.
The injured person succumbed to his injuries after being rushed to the Homagama Hospital.
